JOB DESCRIPTION:
Job Description:

 1. Application development experience with C#/ .Net platforms. Experience with ASP.NET MVC,  Web API.

 2. Experience with SQL Server and demonstrated proficiency with SQL,  stored procedures and scripts.

 3. Experience with Bootstrap,  Angular JS,  jQuery,  Javascript,  and AJAX Experience with HTML and charting library like D3JS,  CanvasJs.

 4. Thorough understanding of HTTP requests and session management.

 5. Thorough understanding of object- oriented development (OOD),  including an in- depth knowledge of implementing design patterns and architectures.

 6. Must have experience with code repository tools like SVN,  Git.
